languageKey.label: Forgot your password?
Start password recovery
« Go back
« Go back to login screen
E-mail or username
Forgot your password?
Please enter your e-mail or username in order to start the password recovery process. If you entered correct data, a link to the password reset form will be sent to your e-mail address.
User not found
Could not find a user with the provided username/e-mail.
Multiple users found
Multiple users found with the provided username/e-mail. Please contact website administrators. Password recovery process failed.
User has no valid e-mail
A user with the provided username has been found, but unfortunately that user has no e-mail address configured. Please contact website administrators. Password recovery process failed.
Password recovery
E-mail containing information regarding completing the password recovery process has been sent to your address.
Error

An error occured while trying to send you an email containing information regarding completing the password recovery process. Please try again later or contact website administrators if this problems persists for a longer period of time.
Password recovery
Hi %s,

Best regards,
%s Team
Someone (probably you) has initialized a password recovery process for your account on the website "%s". Please click on the following link in order to reset your password:
The link will automatically expire in 1 hour. If you did not initialize the password recovery process please ignore this email.
Change password
Please enter new password for the account "%s":
New password
New password (repeat)
Submit
Password recovery expired

There was an error while trying to continue the password recovery process. If you have come here by clicking a link in your email it has probably expired. Please start the password recovery process from scratch.
Restart password recovery »
Password changed successfully
Your password has been successfully changed.
Proceed to the login form »
An error occurred
An error occurred while trying to update your password. Please make sure you entered both passwords.
